## Ecuador databases

Summary of Ecuadorian firm-level databases. Website: https://www.ecuadorencifras.gob.ec 

### Encuesta Estructural Empresarial (ENESEM)

Available for years 2011, 2015-2020. 7 years in total. It focuses on big and medium firms —50 employees or more, and $1'000.001 COL annual sales or more.

### Encuesta de Manufactura y Minería

Firms with 10 employees or more. An annual national survey. It runs from 2002-2006, 2008-2014 in SPSS, and 1997-2009 in DBF. Manufacturing and mining sectors.

### Encuesta Exhaustiva 2011

It covers medium and large firms —10 employees or more— and micro firms —9 or fewer employees.
